episode_summary: In this episode, Erin Helle discusses the importance of defining and communicating a value proposition in the real estate industry, especially in light of the NAR settlement. She provides actionable steps for creating a client avatar and developing a mission statement to effectively convey an agent's unique value to clients. Additionally, she emphasizes the importance of transparency and honesty in building a successful real estate business.
